original_solution_mapping.L1: She needs to type an additional 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=800>>800 words.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In one minute she can type 300 words / 30 = <<300/30=10>>10 words.
original_solution_mapping.L3: It will take her 800 / 10 = <<800/10=80>>80 more minutes to finish typing the report.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 6236.
    Returns: the number of additional minutes needed to finish the report.
    """
    # L1
    total_words_needed = 1000 # 1000 words in length
    words_already_written = 200 # already written 200 words
    additional_words_needed = total_words_needed - words_already_written

    # L2
    words_per_half_hour = 300 # type 300 words in half an hour
    minutes_in_half_hour = 30 # WK
    words_per_minute = words_per_half_hour / minutes_in_half_hour

    # L3
    time_to_finish_minutes = additional_words_needed / words_per_minute

    # FA
    answer = time_to_finish_minutes
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: She needs to type an additional {total_words_needed} - {words_already_written} = <<{total_words_needed}-{words_already_written}={additional_words_needed}>>{additional_words_needed} words.
In one minute she can type {words_per_half_hour} words / {minutes_in_half_hour} = <<{words_per_half_hour}/{minutes_in_half_hour}={words_per_minute}>>{words_per_minute} words.

It will take her {additional_words_needed} / {words_per_minute} = <<{additional_words_needed}/{words_per_minute}={time_to_finish_minutes}>>{time_to_finish_minutes} more minutes to finish typing the report.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: She needs to type an additional 1000 - 200 = <<1000-200=800>>800 words.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In one minute she can type 30 words / 30 = <<30/30=1>>1 words.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: It will take her 800 / 1 = <<800/1=800>>800 more minutes to finish typing the report.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'minutes_in_half_hour' (30) was used instead of 'words_per_half_hour' (300).
